text: A water-tube boiler is a type of boiler in which water circulates in tubes heated by fire from outside. The fire is produced by the fuel being burned inside the furnace for the boiler. ==Design types== * Babcock and Wilcox boiler * A/D/M/O-type boiler * Flex-tube boiler * Forced-circulation boiler * Low water content * Stirling boiler * Thornycroft * White-Forster * Yarrow boiler ==Use== * Marine * Railway * Stationary Category:Boilers
title: Water-tube boiler
